name: This game is good.
description:
### IF YOU ARE TOTALLY CONFUSED, ###

you can download the solution below.

###

This game was created for the Community Game Jam 2019 in less than a week. It is just a small submission as I did not have much time.

Talk to a superintelligent A.I. using the command line. It definetly wants to help you. And all of humanity. HAHA. This is a riddle.

There are also plenty of easter eggs where I ... it says something funny. I have analysed human humor, so I know what I am doing.

All art, sound and music are made by me during the jam.

DISCLAIMER: NO FUN INCLUDED!

Have fun.
